data.title: 26 Fun Corporate Team Building Ideas for 2024 in San Jose
data.meta_description: Looking for a crazy fun San Jose team building activity in 2024? Use our list of awesome and fun ideas to plan your next outing.
data.text:
Are you planning a corporate team building event in San Jose and Silicon Valley, or Bay Area as part of your next retreat and need activity ideas? Use our collection of 26 fun team-building activities in San Jose to plan your next outing or company retreat. Each list item was chosen to bring employees together, enhance communication, and provide team memories. You could get your team battling remote control cars with us or throwing axes with Axeventures. Boosting your corporate team’s morale and relieving stress with a well planned San Jose team building idea is easy.

All of the activities on our list can be classified as team building exercises, fun team activities, or team bonding. The uniting factor is your group will be together and enjoying themselves as a team. This list of top ideas contains both indoor team building activities and outdoor team building ideas. Remember, that no matter the team activity you choose the true value is spending time together.

Whether you are looking for fun group team activities in San Jose or nearby cities like Cupertino, Santa Clara, or Mountainview, we have you covered. Don’t feel like planning everything yourself? Reach out to us today at 877.267.1939 or request a quote. Our team is committed to providing you with a stress-free planning experience.

26 San Jose Team Building Ideas

1. Ramp It Up: Skateboard for Charity

It’s time to challenge the common perception that skateboards are just toys and distractions. In fact, skateboarding can be a powerful tool for kids in low-income areas, providing them with the opportunity to make friends, build resilience, express themselves, and develop confidence and identity. San Jose is full of wonderful kids who’s lives could be changed by receiving a new skateboard.

Skateboarding is a unique and amazing space that promotes problem-solving and determination. Kids spend hours practicing and perfecting their tricks until they achieve mastery. This type of dedication and perseverance is an invaluable life skill.

You can help local children experience the independence and joy that comes with owning their first skateboard. By assembling boards for them and creating meaningful artwork on the bottom as a message of support and encouragement, your team can make a difference in the San Jose community.

During the event, your team will have the chance to apply grip tape, insert bearings into the wheels, mount the wheels onto the trucks, and attach the trucks to the board. Together, you’ll also design a heartfelt message on the bottom of the skateboard. It’s a fun and rewarding way to give back while empowering local kids to discover the benefits of skateboarding.

Pricing: Pricing varies

Group Size: Any

Address: Anywhere!

Website

2. Wreck ‘Em Rally: Remote Control BattleBots

Once you’ve created your mean machine, face off against other teams in a thrilling time trial filled with balloons and pitstops. But that’s just the warm-up! In the Melee Round, you’ll be thrown into a demolition derby where you’ll need to rely on collaboration, trust, and teamwork to emerge victorious.

Think you have what it takes to be the last team standing with a balloon intact? This adrenaline-fueled activity will test your skills and bring out the best in your team. Get ready for a thrilling ride filled with laughter, excitement, and a lot of fun! So, buckle up and let’s race to the finish line!

Pricing: Pricing varies

Group Size: Any

Address: Anywhere!

Website

3. Techno Rally: San Jose App-Based Scavenger Hunt

Are you ready to explore San Jose with an exciting adventure guaranteed to boost employee engagement like never before? Look no further than our fast-paced, high-tech scavenger hunt experience!

Race against the clock and your fellow coworkers as you complete a series of hilarious photo missions using our Android/iPhone app. Explore the bustling streets of San Jose as you work together to complete tasks that might have you giving strangers piggyback rides or wrapping team members up like mummies with toilet paper.

But that’s not all – you’ll also have to put your problem-solving skills to the test with puzzles, staffed checkpoints, and trivia. It’s like the Amazing Race meets a scavenger hunt on a Red Bull-infused high.

No wonder top companies like Amazon, Microsoft, Red Bull, Netflix, and Intel trust us to deliver unforgettable team-building experiences. Don’t settle for anything less – let us take your team on an adventure they’ll never forget!

Pricing: Pricing varies

Group Size: Any

Address: Anywhere!

Website

4. Get Creative at Valley Painting Parties

Looking for a fun and engaging team-building event in San Jose? Look no further than Valley Painting Parties! Their team can help you create a unique and creative experience that will bring your group closer together. Your team will have the opportunity to express their individual creativity while contributing to a larger group painting project. It’s just like putting together a puzzle, and every participant plays a vital role in creating the final masterpiece.

Planning an on-site or off-site event is a breeze. Valley Painting Parties provides all the necessary materials and expertise, and can even help facilitate food for the event if needed. So why not try something new and fun for your next team-building event with Valley Painting Parties in San Jose?

Pricing: $43 per person

Group Size: 1-12 people

Address: Contact for location

Website

5. Explore the Winchester Mystery House

The Winchester Mystery House is a must-see! This famous mansion, built by the widow of the inventor of the Winchester rifle, boasts 160 rooms and countless mysterious features that are sure to spark the curiosity of your team.

As a team-building activity, the Winchester Mystery House offers an opportunity to work together to solve puzzles, navigate mazes, and uncover hidden secrets. The mansion’s intricate design and perplexing features will challenge your team’s problem-solving skills and encourage communication and collaboration.

In addition to its challenging and engaging activities, the Winchester Mystery House also offers a fascinating history lesson. Your team can learn about the fascinating life of Sarah Winchester and the strange building practices that went into creating this one-of-a-kind mansion.

Whether you’re looking for a fun day out of the office or a team-building activity that will challenge and engage your team, the Winchester Mystery House is an excellent choice. So, gather your team and get ready for a thrilling and unforgettable experience in San Jose!

Pricing: $41.99 per person

Group Size: 1-30 people

Address: 525 S Winchester Blvd, San Jose CA

Website

6. Let Off Steam with Break Stuff Bay Area

Looking for a thrilling team-building activity in San Jose? Look no further than Break Stuff! Their stress therapy demolition center is the perfect place to let loose and smash some inanimate objects. Their mission is to provide a controlled environment for chaos, where you and your team can take out any frustrations or stress you may be feeling. They offer a wide range of objects to destroy, from televisions and glass bottles to computers and even garden gnomes!

Not only is Break Stuff an exhilarating experience, but it also encourages teamwork and communication. You and your team will work together to smash objects and let off steam, creating a bond that can only come from shared chaos.

So, if you’re ready for a unique team-building activity, come check out Break Stuff in the Bay Area.

Pricing: $125 per person

Group Size: 5-20 people

Address: 860 S 1st St. San Jose, CA

Website

7. Axe Throwing with AxeVentures

Looking for a team building experience in a fun and challenging environment? Look no further than AxeVentures in the heart of the Silicon Valley. AxeVentures offers more than just throwing axes for fun, they provide an opportunity to tap into one’s primal and adventurous self with an activity rooted in ancient warfare. Axe throwing is not only a great way to connect with friends and family but also an excellent way to build team spirit and camaraderie among coworkers.

In addition to team building, axe throwing at AxeVentures is an excellent outlet for relieving stress. Feeling overwhelmed or frustrated with work? Take your team to AxeVentures and let it all out through the exhilarating experience of throwing axes. Don’t miss out on this unique and exciting team building activity – book your event at AxeVentures San Jose today!

Pricing: Contact for pricing

Group Size: 1-20 people

Address: 850 Park Ave San Jose, CA

Website

8. Blow Glass with Infuse Glass Studio

Looking for an engaging team-building activity? Then Infuse Glass Studio is the spot for you! Their private studio offers a warm and welcoming environment, perfect for your next creative endeavor. Your team members will have the opportunity to explore their artistic sides and collaborate in new and exciting ways.

Their project-based workshop is specifically designed to foster problem-solving and encourage creative thinking through the design process. With their expert guidance and high-quality materials, your team will learn new skills and create unique pieces of art. By using unfamiliar materials, participants are encouraged to step outside of their comfort zones and discover new forms of artistic expression.

So, if you’re ready to inspire your team through creativity and collaboration, book a session at Infuse Glass Studio today! Your team will leave feeling energized, refreshed, and with a newfound appreciation for the power of artistic expression.

Pricing: $85 per person

Group Size: 1-40 people

Address: 592 North 5th Street San Jose, CA

Website

9. Laser Tag at Lasermaxx

Laser tag at Lasermaxx is the ultimate team building activity or work retreat experience that is sure to bring out the inner child in everyone. This heart-pumping activity is perfect for bonding with colleagues and promoting teamwork in an exciting and interactive way.

Imagine sneaking around a darkened arena, laser gun in hand, strategizing with your teammates to outsmart the opposing team. The adrenaline rush of dodging laser beams and taking down the enemy is unmatched!

In addition to being a thrilling activity, laser tag also requires communication, teamwork, and quick decision-making skills. This makes it an ideal team building activity that helps improve morale, boost team spirit, and enhance productivity. With its combination of physical activity and mental challenges, laser tag is a great way to promote health and wellness while building strong and cohesive teams. So why settle for a boring work retreat when you can level up your team’s skills and have a blast at the same time with laser tag!

Pricing: $129 for 6 players; $18.99 per additional player

Group Size: 1-6 people

Address: 035 E Capitol Expy, San Jose, CA

Website

10. Immersive Gamebox

Gamebox is the perfect place to bond with your team near San Jose, CA. With a wide selection of immersive games, you and your group are sure to have a blast together. From motion tracking to touch screens and surround sound, Immersive Gamebox provides a one-of-a-kind experience that you won’t find anywhere else. And to make things even better, drinks are delivered right to you while you play!

Whether you’re a group of coworkers looking for a team building activity, or just a group of friends looking for a unique way to spend an afternoon, Immersive Gamebox has got you covered. So why not come on down and play together? You’re sure to have a great time!

Pricing: $29.99 per person

Group Size: 10+ people

Address: 2855 Stevens Creek Blvd Unit 2605, Santa Clara, CA

Website

11. Bike Tour with San Jose Brew Bike

San Jose Brew Bike might just be the perfect choice for your next team outing. A brew bike is essentially a mobile bar on wheels, allowing you and your group to pedal your way around town while enjoying your favorite brews.

Not only is a brew bike a fun way to get some exercise and fresh air, it’s also a great opportunity to bond with your friends or coworkers. As you pedal along, you’ll be able to chat, laugh, and enjoy each other’s company in a relaxed and casual setting.

But that’s not all – a brew bike also provides a great way to explore your city or town. You’ll be able to see the sights and sounds from a unique perspective, stopping off at local breweries, pubs, or bars along the way.

Overall, a brew bike is a fun and memorable group activity that’s perfect for any occasion – from birthday parties to team building events. So why not gather your friends or coworkers and take a ride on a brew bike? It’s sure to be an experience you’ll never forget!

Pricing: $450 for 15 people; for groups smaller than 15, $50 per person

Group Size: 1-15 people

Address: 120 W Frenando St, San Jose, CA

Website

12. Team Building Mini Golf at Emerald Hills Golfland

Emerald Hills Golfland is the perfect destination for those seeking a fun team building retreat. With challenging miniature golf courses, participants can experience a whole new level of fun as they navigate through various obstacles and terrains. The course is designed to cater to all skill levels, ensuring that everyone can enjoy the experience.

But the fun doesn’t end there! The park offers an array of entertainment options, including a massive video game arcade that’s sure to bring out the competitive spirit in everyone. And when hunger strikes, the full snack bar offers a variety of delicious treats to satisfy every craving.

For those seeking a bit more adventure, there are three thrilling waterslides to enjoy. The slides are perfect for those looking to cool off during the hot summer months, and they provide a perfect opportunity to bond and have fun with colleagues.

Located in the Bay Area, Emerald Hills Golfland is easily accessible and offers a one-of-a-kind experience that’s sure to bring teams closer together. So, gather your team, and get ready to create unforgettable memories at this fun-filled destination!

Pricing: $16.75 per person; price varies depending on packages

Group Size: 1-50 people

Address: 976 Blossom Hill Road San Jose, CA

Website

13. Trails and Teamwork: Building Connections Outdoors

The Los Gatos Creek Trail is an excellent team building activity that offers a range of benefits for participants. This scenic trail is located in the heart of Silicon Valley and is perfect for teams looking to bond and build relationships while enjoying the great outdoors.

The trail offers a variety of challenges, including steep inclines, rocky terrain, and beautiful views, providing an opportunity for teams to work together and support one another. Participants can enjoy hiking, jogging, biking, and other outdoor activities, which can help improve physical fitness, mental health, and overall well-being.

In addition to the physical benefits, the Los Gatos Creek Trail provides a space for teams to engage in meaningful conversations and build trust, leading to improved communication and collaboration. The natural beauty of the trail can also help reduce stress and increase creativity, providing a unique setting for team building activities.

Overall, the Los Gatos Creek Trail is an excellent team building activity that offers a range of benefits for participants. It provides an opportunity for teams to bond, build relationships, and engage in meaningful conversations while enjoying the great outdoors.

Pricing: Free

Group Size: 1-100 people

Address: Los Gatos Creek Trail, 1250 Dell Ave, Campbell, CA

Website

14. Work Hard, Play Hard With Santa Clara Paint Ball

This top-rated paintball destination is an exciting team building destination near San Jose and offers 12 dedicated playing fields and a variety of paintball-related activities for all ages, making it the perfect choice for groups looking to bond and build teamwork skills.

Santa Clara Paintball has become a go-to destination for paintball enthusiasts and first-time players alike from the greater Bay Area and beyond. The park’s focus on healthy and constructive teamwork has made it a popular choice for Silicon Valley’s tech giants and an annual trek for building team cohesion.

With its ability to evolve and reinvent itself, Santa Clara Paintball consistently stays ahead of the competition and ensures it will remain Northern California’s most played-at paintball park. So gather your team and get ready for an action-packed day of paintball fun at Santa Clara Paintball!

Pricing: $85 per person

Group Size: 1-20 people

Address: 2542 Monterey Hwy San Jose, CA

Website

15. Picnic at Almaden Park

Looking for a budget-friendly and fun work retreat? Look no further than hosting a picnic at Almaden Lake Park in San Jose! The park’s stunning beauty provides the perfect environment for team members to bond, unwind, and rejuvenate. With lush greenery, a serene lake, and fresh air, your team will feel refreshed and energized.

A picnic also provides the perfect opportunity for team members to interact in a relaxed and informal setting. Away from the stress of the office, colleagues can get to know each other on a personal level, build trust, and forge stronger working relationships.

And the best part? Hosting a team-building picnic at Almaden Lake Park won’t break the bank. With facilities such as picnic tables, BBQ grills, and sports fields, organizing games and activities is a breeze.

Overall, a team-building picnic at Almaden Lake Park is an upbeat and budget-friendly way to boost team morale, improve communication, and promote a positive workplace culture. So why not plan your next work retreat at this gorgeous park today?

Pricing: Free

Group Size: 1-100 people

Address: 6099 Winfield Blvd, San Jose, CA

Website

16. Artistic Adventures a Fun Team-Building Experience at San Jose Museum of Art

The San Jose Museum of Art is a great place to explore and appreciate art while bonding with your team. The museum’s commitment to staying current with the latest trends in the art world means that there’s always something new and exciting to discover. This museum is at the forefront of contemporary art, showcasing a permanent collection of over 2500 pieces that are sure to impress. Not only will your team have the opportunity to enjoy vibrant modern exhibits, but they’ll also be treated to experimental audio and video installations that turn the museum into an exciting multi-sensory art experience. Whether you’re an art enthusiast or just looking for a unique team-building experience, the San Jose Museum of Art is sure to leave a lasting impression. So why not plan your next team-building event at the museum and see what all the buzz is about?

Pricing: $10 per person

Group Size: 1-30 people

Address: 110 South Market Street, San Jose, CA

Website

17. Explore San Jose Japantown

Japantown’s bustling streets are filled with a mix of trendy shops, galleries, and restaurants that offer a unique and exciting experience. The dining scene is particularly noteworthy, with delicious regional Japanese cuisine, Japanese-American, and Hawaiian diners available in unpretentious eateries. Plus, the karaoke bars are a blast!

In addition to the fantastic food and entertainment, Japantown also offers a rich cultural experience. The Japanese American Museum provides insight into the stories of immigration and internment during WWII, and the San Jose Buddhist Church Betsuin offers a serene escape in its beautiful gardens.

But what makes Japantown even better is that it’s a great team-building locations in downtown San Jose. As a team, exploring Japantown allows you to try new foods, have fun singing karaoke, and learn about the history and culture of the area. This shared experience can help your team bond and connect, leading to better collaboration and communication in the workplace. Overall, Japantown is a unique and exciting destination that provides the perfect combination of entertainment, culture, and team-building opportunities.

Pricing: Price varies

Group Size: 1-100 people

Address: 408 Almaden Boulevard San Jose, CA

Website

18. The Ultimate Redwood Adventure with Mount Hermon Adventures

Get ready to embark on the ultimate redwood adventure, just a short trip away from San Jose! Mount Hermon Adventures mission is to create an unforgettable outdoor experience that inspires and challenges people of all backgrounds.

The redwood forests provide a stunning backdrop for team building activities that are sure to leave a lasting impression. As a team, you can challenge yourself with exciting activities such as zip-lining or a tree-top obstacle courses. These experiences not only provide an adrenaline rush but also foster trust, communication, and teamwork. This outdoor adventure offers a unique and exciting way to bring team members together, bond, and build trust. Overall, the redwood adventure is the perfect way to escape the hustle and bustle of the city and build stronger teams in a fun and engaging way.

19. Rev Up You Engines at K1 Speed Santa Clara

Get ready to rev up your engines and experience the thrill of electric indoor go-kart racing at K1 Speed Santa Clara! Whether you’re a motor sport enthusiast or looking for a fun way to bond with your friends and family, K1 Speed is a must-visit destination.

K1 Speed Santa Clara is the top choice for indoor go-kart racing in the San Jose, Sunnyvale, Silicon Valley, Palo Alto, and greater Central Coast area. So why not come on down and turn a lap yourself? We’re confident that you’ll have a blast and that the experience will bring your team closer together. It’s the perfect team-building activity that combines competition, excitement, and a whole lot of fun!

20. Rock Climbing with Movement Santa Clara!

Are you ready for an unforgettable team building experience that combines physical challenge with mental and emotional growth? Movement Santa Clara is the spot for you. This epic rock climbing gym provides the perfect backdrop for building strong connections and pushing yourself to new heights as a team.

As you climb to the top of the wall, you’ll rely on your team members for support and encouragement, fostering a sense of camaraderie and trust. You’ll also learn to communicate more effectively, working together to overcome obstacles and achieve your goals. Whether you’re a seasoned climber or a newbie, Movement Santa Clara has something to offer everyone. Get ready to climb your way to success with your team at Movement Santa Clara!

21. MINIBOSS: San Jose’s Ultimate Arcade Bar Experience

MINIBOSS offers an ideal venue for group outings, providing ample open bar top seating and tables to accommodate any size gathering. With a variety of over 30 arcade cabinets and 12 fully functioning pinball machines throughout the space, guests are sure to find entertainment to suit their tastes. The uniquely themed decor showcases art created by San Jose locals, offering the perfect backdrop for capturing fun memories on social media. Additionally, the kitchen team is always hard at work preparing fresh and elevated bar fare, including phenomenal pan pizza, to accompany your drinks. MINIBOSS is a one-of-a-kind location that provides the ultimate team-building activity in a fun and exciting atmosphere.

22. Sushi-Making Made Fun: A Beginner’s Workshop in San Jose

If you’re a sushi enthusiast looking for a fun team-building activity or a unique group experience, look no further than this beginner’s sushi-making workshop in San Jose. Led by expert chef Elham, this hands-on class teaches participants how to create delicious and visually appealing sushi rolls using fresh seafood and other ingredients.

Not a fan of seafood? No problem! Vegetarian options are available upon request, so everyone can get in on the fun. Participants will learn how to perfectly season sushi rice, create popular rolls like California and Spicy Tuna, and even make nigiri.

Chef Elham will also provide insights into essential ingredients and where to purchase them, so participants can continue practicing their sushi-making skills at home. Perfect for birthday parties, team-building events, or just a fun evening out with friends, this sushi-making class promises a delicious and unforgettable experience for all.

Group Size: 1-10 people

Address: Contact for location

23. Opal’z Candle-Making Class

Opal’z beginner friendly candle-making class will teach you and your group how to create three different types of candles using a variety of materials and techniques.

Participants will learn about different types of wax, vessels, and wicks, as well as candle safety and scent blending to create their own unique fragrance combinations. The class includes the materials needed to create two fragrant soy container candles and a whimsical gel candle, all of which can be taken home as souvenirs.

If your group is larger than 8 guests, Opal’z will come to you and offer a mobile experience focused on making soy container candles. This workshop is perfect for team-building events, creative birthday parties, or even bachelorette parties. The San Francisco Bay Area is within reach, as travel fees are included in the mobile offering. Contact Opal’z for more information on group mobile or on-site experiences.

Pricing: $30-$120 per person

Group Size: 4-200 people

Address: Mountain View, CA

Website

24. Explore – SoFA District San Jose

The SoFA District in Downtown San Jose is a bustling center for culture, art, and entertainment that offers a perfect escape after a long day of meetings or conferences. Visitors can enjoy a variety of activities, including poetry readings at cozy coffee shops or sampling cold brews at craft breweries. The district also boasts several art galleries within walking distance, featuring original murals that make for great photo opportunities.

With a lively bar scene and cutting-edge theaters, the SoFA District is also an excellent destination for entertainment and nightlife. Those visiting the district may even stumble upon one of the many festivals held throughout the year, such as the South First Fridays Art Walk, SubZERO Festival, and SoFA Street Fair. There’s so much to see and do in the SoFA District, making it a great choice for team-building activities, creative brainstorming, or simply a night out with friends or colleagues.

Group Size: 1-100 people

Address: South 1st St, San Jose, CA

If you’re looking for a fun and healthy way to bond with your colleagues, consider joining our beginner’s yoga class in Santa Clara. Led by the experienced instructor Kushal, this class offers a unique opportunity to unwind and destress while engaging in meditative yoga practice in the great outdoors.

No matter your level of experience, everyone is welcome to participate in this beginner-friendly class. By practicing yoga, you will not only improve your physical health, but also your mental wellbeing.

Classes are limited to a maximum of ten students, allowing for a more personalized and intimate experience. Join us on the lawn close to the fountain, across USPS and adjacent to the University Plaza, for a relaxing and rejuvenating team-building activity.

Don’t miss out on this chance to strengthen your team’s bond while breaking a sweat! Remember to RSVP in advance to secure your spot. We can’t wait to see you there.

Pricing: $20 per person

Group Size: 1-10 people

Address: 171 Homestead Rd #140a, Santa Clara, CA

Website

26. Cultivate Kitchen Cooking Class

Cooking classes are an excellent way to build strong bonds within a team while also learning new skills and having fun. At Cultivate Kitchen, people not only learn how to cook but also cultivate relationships and a passion for food and wine. Working together to create a delicious meal requires communication, collaboration, and problem-solving skills, all of which are essential in any team-building exercise. Additionally, cooking classes allow team members to step out of their comfort zones and try new things, which can lead to increased confidence and creativity. Not to mention, everyone gets to enjoy the fruits of their labor by indulging in a delicious meal together. So, if you’re looking for a unique and engaging team-building activity, a cooking class at Cultivate Kitchen is a great option.

Group Size: 1-30 people

Address: 54 The Alameda, San Jose, CA
